      Methods in org.hibernate.search.impl with parameters of type SearchConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SearchMapping SearchMappingBuilder.getSearchMapping(SearchConfiguration cfg)
      This factory method takes a SearchConfiguration object and returns a SearchMapping object which defines the programmatic model for indexing entities and fields.
      Constructors in org.hibernate.search.impl with parameters of type SearchConfiguration 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigContext(SearchConfiguration cfg) 
      ConfigContext(SearchConfiguration cfg, SearchMapping searchMapping) 
      ReflectionReplacingSearchConfiguration(org.hibernate.annotations.common.reflection.ReflectionManager reflectionManager, SearchConfiguration cfg)
      Create a new SearchConfiguration which returns the same values as the provided SearchConfiguration instance, with the exception of ReflectionReplacingSearchConfiguration.getReflectionManager() which will return the constructor defined ReflectionManager.
